title: Apple reports record Q4 earnings, beats expectations
summary: Apple Inc (AAPL) reported quarterly earnings that exceeded analyst expectations. The company saw strong iPhone sales.

title: Microsoft stock surges on cloud revenue growth
summary: Microsoft (MSFT) shares jumped 5% after the company reported Azure revenue growth of 29%. Analysts remain bullish.

title: Tesla faces production challenges, shares decline
summary: Tesla Inc (TSLA) warned of slower production growth. The company cited supply chain issues. Shares fell 3% in after-hours.

title: Fed signals potential rate cuts in 2024
summary: Federal Reserve officials hinted at possible interest rate reductions later this year if inflation continues to moderate.

title: NVIDIA announces acquisition of AI startup
summary: NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) announced it will acquire a leading AI chip startup for $500 million. The deal expands NVIDIA's AI capabilities.
